TopicTitle: So I'm trying to construct an unfoldable asteroid puller.

Articles.Content:
I've tried Infernal Robotic's hinges, but they fail to keep the arms stable, and they don't work with struts. (Maybe using pistons will work)

KAS requires a number pad for winches, which I have no access to.

I'm considering Active Struts to strengthen it, but I'm not sure if the range is far enough....

No replies?

Anyway, tried both a combo of Active Struts and Infernal Robotics, the struts can't take the thrust of 4 nuclear engines.

...And i need this to be aerodynamic for NEAR.....

Maybe a picture would help. It has to be aero for launch only or reentry? If launch is all that's needed, procedural fairings could help.

Edited September 5, 2014 by z26
